title: CID officers visit ’GotaGoGama’ to record statements again
body_lines: Several officers of the Criminal Investigations Department (CID) today visited the 'GotaGoGama' protest site at Galle Face Green with regard to the ongoing investigations being carried out over the May 9 attack.
The CID officers have recorded several statements from the protesters.
Earlier, the CID also recorded statements from several individuals at the protest site over the attack on protesters.
The protesters earlier said that they gave their testimonies and statements to the CID and clearly mentioned the individuals who were present on that day.
